pages.text: Space stations and planetary bases require reliable power systems. Ad Astra Mekanized uses Forge Energy (FE/RF) for all power requirements, making it compatible with most tech mods.

pages.title: Power Requirements
pages.text: These machines require power:$(br)$(br)- Oxygen Distributors$(br)- NASA Workbenches$(br)- Power Relays$(br)- Wireless Power Relays$(br)- Various other machinery$(br)$(br)Use any FE/RF power generation system to supply energy.

pages.title: Power Distribution
pages.text: Power can be distributed using:$(br)$(br)1. $(bold)Direct connections$() - Connect machines to generators$(br)2. $(bold)Power cables$() - Use cables from tech mods$(br)3. $(bold)Power Relays$() - Transfer power over distances$(br)4. $(bold)Wireless Relays$() - Wireless power transmission
